mng: to add, plus, (used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned), to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb), to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

exm.mng: to become a member, to join, to mix into, to participate in, to add in
to participate, to take part, to join
to add something extra, an additional increment, addendum, to append, an additional posthumous title
plus, to put in, to add, to add on, to add into, in addition, on top of that
to reinforce, to strengthen, to increase
